extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected product to at least version 1.0.613.0 as recommended by Beckhoff Automation.

extracted_playbook.title: Inspect Administrative Actions
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure administrative users thoroughly inspect the values they enter to prevent misconfigurations.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet to reduce risk of exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use secure methods such as VPNs for remote access, ensuring they are updated to the most recent version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
